meta.note: Contacts are the people at the different organizations you work with.
Conversations are for all the threads between you and your clients. Conversations contain messages.
The Inbox is for all your incoming unqualified leads and form submissions
Messages are the individual parts of a conversation.
Organizations are your clients and customers.
Activities are the calls, meetings, and more that move your Deals forward in your pipeline.
Deals are your pipeline for new projects.
Projects are where you manage the deliverables, tasks, and milestones of producing what you sold to clients.
Use Proposals to craft amazing quotes or statements of work for clients.
Many-to-Any page builder example
Simple blog posts example
Folder to organize all the Sales department functions.
If enabled, image position is alternated between left and right.
Show the step numbers on the website. For example: (Step 1, Step 2, etc)

options.text: This block will fetch all the `published` team members from the `team` collection and render them on the site.

meta.note: Notes about this contact. Never visible to this person or their organization.
Click to open a dialer or your email application.
Is this an active contact?
Not every contact will have a login to the portal. This is the linked user account for this contact.
The fields for the form.

meta.note: Who is responsible for completing this task?
(Optional) If this step is assigned to someone on our team - we can default the assignment here.
Can the client see this task in their portal?
Prepopulate start dates and due dates for task based on when you start a project or when the target completion date is.
Relative days to use as the start date for this task - if you enter 7 and chose from "Start of Project", the task start date would be calculated and set to 7 days after the project start date.
Relative days to use as the due date for this task - if you enter 3 and chose from "Project Due Date", the task due date would be set to 3 days before the due date.
Add a form for the client to fill out inside the portal.
Copy and paste the link from third party services like Airtable, Calendly, Typeform, and more here to add an embed to the client task on the portal.

We'll auto-populate this number for the next proposal you create.

Hide this block on the frontend without having to remove it from your page.

options.text: For redirects to take effect, the site has to be re-deployed.

meta.note: Where should the canonical URL for this entry point to.
This entries meta description. Max 160 characters.
Instruct crawlers not to follow links on this page.
Instruct crawlers not to index this entry.
How often to instruct search engines to crawl.

Valid values range from 0.0 to 1.0. This value does not affect how your pages are compared to pages on other sites, it only lets the search engines know which pages you deem most important for the crawlers.
This entries title, defaults to title. Max 70 characters including the site name.
